amendment.description: To provide grants to reimburse general aviation entities for the security costs incurred and revenue foregone as a result of terrorism and the military action against Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 900 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 900 proposed by Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S7810-7811) To provide grants to reimburse general aviation entities for the security costs incurred and revenue foregone as a result of terrorism and the military action against Iraq.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 900 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 900 proposed by Senator Burns.
